item.title: 加纳因天气原因下调 2024-25 年可可收成预测
item.description: 加纳第二次下调了从 9 月份开始的可可收获季节的收成预测，这是世界第二大可可种植国最近一次供应受挫，有可能进一步助长价格上涨，对巧克力商和消费者都造成打击。【原文：Ghana cut its cocoa harvest forecast a second time for the season that started September, the latest supply setback in the world’s second-largest grower that risks further fueling a price rally that has hit both chocolatiers and consumers.】

item.title: 特朗普要求欧盟购买更多美国石油和天然气，但这一要求很难得到回应
item.description:
扩大采购面临诸多实际限制，尤其是该国的供应量有限。【原文：

Ramping up purchases faces numerous practical constraints, not least the country’s limited supply.

】

item.title: 炼油业受挫，俄罗斯燃料出口将逐年下降
item.description: 在俄罗斯炼油厂缩减加工规模、莫斯科下令优先发展国内市场之后，俄罗斯今年的海运燃料出口量将大幅下降。【原文：Russia’s seaborne fuel exports are set to fall sharply this year after the country’s oil refineries scaled back processing and Moscow ordered them to prioritize the domestic market.】

item.title: 今年液化天然气流量创历史新高，欧洲仍对俄罗斯天然气情有独钟
item.description: 在流经乌克兰的管道供应紧张局势加剧的背景下，欧盟增加了对俄罗斯液化天然气的进口。【原文：The European Union boosted imports of Russian liquefied natural gas against the backdrop of deepening tensions over pipeline supplies that flow through Ukraine.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔的早期赌注直指特朗普白宫
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔对人的投资似乎正在获得回报，就像他对初创企业的风险投资支持一样。但首先...【原文：Peter Thiel’s investments in people appear to be paying off just like his venture capital support for startups. But first...】

item.title: 创纪录的可可价格凸显巧克力为何需要 B 计划
item.description: 谁能想到将葵花籽与糖和植物油混合也能制作巧克力？【原文：Who knew that mixing sunflower seeds with sugar and vegetable oils was another way to make chocolate?】

item.title: 每个人都想成为我的朋友特朗普惊叹于科技巨头的关注
item.description: 科技行业最有权势的领导者们正在尝试一种新的玩法，与历来反对他们主导地位的唐纳德-特朗普打交道：当面用餐。【原文：The most powerful leaders in the tech industry are trying out a new playbook to engage Donald Trump, who has been historically opposed to their dominance: in-person dining.】

item.title: 英国为批准 Synopsys 350 亿美元的 Ansys 交易设定条件
item.description: 根据监管机构的声明，如果两家公司解决了英国反垄断监管机构提出的竞争问题，Synopsys 公司 350 亿美元收购软件开发商 Ansys 公司的计划可能会获得批准。【原文：Synopsys Inc.’s $35 billion plan to take over software developer Ansys Inc. could be cleared if the two companies address competition concerns flagged by the UK’s antitrust watchdog, according to the regulator’s statement.】

item.title: 比特币暴跌，因为特朗普的欣喜让位于对美联储的警惕
item.description: 由于美联储发出的鹰派信号促使交易商抛售比特币这一今年涨幅超过一倍的资产，比特币的跌幅从本周的历史高点扩大到近15%。【原文：Bitcoin extended its slide from this week’s record high to almost 15% as hawkish signals from the Federal Reserve prompted traders to sell an asset that has more than doubled this year.】

item.title: 为什么用户将为英国的水危机买单？
item.description: 在系统性污水泄漏和管道长期漏水丑闻的影响下，英国水务行业正准备进行自 1989 年私有化以来最大规模的改革。【原文：Britain’s water industry is bracing for the biggest overhaul since privatization in 1989 amid a scandal over systematic sewage spills and chronic pipe leaks.】

item.title: 亏损99%的SPAC大王们再次募集数十亿资金
item.description: 在金融市场上，有许多久负盛名的标志，象征着泡沫的再次形成。比特币在 10 万美元附近徘徊，纳斯达克指数屡创新高，前几天在曼哈顿还发生了一场疯狂的香蕉和导线胶带 "艺术品 "竞拍战。【原文：There are many well-established symbols of the froth building, yet again, in financial markets. There’s Bitcoin hovering around $100,000 or the Nasdaq hitting record high after record high or, for that matter, the wild bidding war that broke out in Manhattan the other day for the banana-and-duct tape “art.”】

item.title: 库什纳的 Affinity 公司从卡塔尔和阿布扎比的 Lunate 公司获得 15 亿美元的额外投资
item.description: 贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）的 Affinity Partners 基金从卡塔尔投资局和阿布扎比资产管理公司 Lunate 募集了 15 亿美元的额外资金，并将其首支基金的投资期延长至 2029 年。【原文：Jared Kushner’s Affinity Partners raised an additional $1.5 billion from the Qatar Investment Authority and Abu Dhabi-based asset manager Lunate, and extended the investment period of its debut fund to 2029.】

item.title: 通胀之争削弱了特朗普的股市交易
item.description: 明年哪些资产表现最佳？让我们一起参与市场脉搏调查。【原文：Which assets will fare the best next year? Let us know and take the Markets Pulse survey.】

item.title: 诺和诺德减肥新药不尽如人意，业绩下滑
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的实验性注射剂 CagriSema 在一项研究中帮助患者平均减轻了 22.7% 的体重，这项研究将有助于确定这家制药商能否继续主导其帮助建立起来的肥胖症药物市场。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S’s experimental shot CagriSema helped patients lose an average of 22.7% of their weight in a study that will help determine whether the drugmaker can continue to dominate the obesity drug market it helped establish.】

item.title: 英伟达收购以色列 Run:ai 公司的交易获得欧盟无条件批准
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）获得欧盟无条件批准，收购以色列初创公司 Run:ai，该公司开发用于处理人工智能计算资源的软件。【原文：Nvidia Corp. won unconditional European Union approval to buy Israeli startup Run:ai, which develops software for handling artificial intelligence computing resources.】

item.title: 即使通胀率上升，俄罗斯央行仍将关键利率维持在 21
item.description: 俄罗斯央行将其关键利率维持在 21% 的历史高位，出乎大多数分析师的意料，他们原本预计决策者会选择再次大幅加息，以试图抑制持续的通货膨胀。【原文：The Bank of Russia held its key interest rate at a record-high 21%, surprising most analysts who’d expected policymakers to opt for another big hike to try to tame persistent inflation.】

item.title: Revolut 欧洲部门面临欧洲央行最高资本要求
item.description: Revolut 有限公司的欧洲分部面临着欧洲中央银行为该地区重要贷款机构设定的最高单项资本要求，因为这家金融科技公司正在追求快速增长，以挑战传统银行。【原文：Revolut Ltd.’s European unit faces the highest individual capital requirement set by the European Central Bank for significant lenders in the region, as the fintech pursues rapid growth to challenge traditional banks.】

item.title: 美联储中枢震荡，美银策略师哈特内特认为市场情绪不稳
item.description: 美国银行公司（Bank of America Corp）策略师迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，美联储的鹰派态度加上股票投资者的过度看涨情绪，导致风险偏好 "突然躁动"。【原文：The hawkish pivot by the Federal Reserve combined with uber-bullish sentiment among stock investors has caused risk appetite to be “suddenly twitchy,” according to Bank of America Corp. strategist Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 荷兰称塔塔钢铁焦炭厂必须清理否则将面临关闭
item.description: 荷兰监管机构威胁塔塔钢铁公司，如果该公司不能在未来 12 个月内大幅减少有毒气体的排放，将对其处以罚款，并强制关闭其位于 IJmuiden 的一家焦炭厂。【原文：Dutch regulators have threatened Tata Steel with fines and the forced closure of one of its coke plants in IJmuiden if the company doesn’t significantly reduce toxic emissions in the next twelve months.】

item.title: 泰国希望通过退税计划刺激经济增长 20 亿美元
item.description: 泰国财政部预计，一项拟议中的退税计划将在明年初促进消费，从而帮助刺激东南亚第二大经济体的发展。【原文：Thailand’s Finance Ministry expects a proposed tax rebate program to boost consumption early next year, helping stimulate Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 消费者情绪降至 19 个月最低点，丹麦人抵挡不住诺和诺德的提振作用
item.description: 丹麦家庭对国内经济的担忧与日俱增，无视诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和整个制药行业近期对北欧国家财政和劳动力市场的推动。【原文：Danish households are increasingly concerned about the domestic economy, ignoring a recent boost to the Nordic country’s finances and labor market from Novo Nordisk A/S and the broader pharma sector.】

item.title: 英国央行加息路径存疑，英国债券市场再遭重创
item.description: 英国政府的长期借款成本正逼近 1998 年以来的最高水平，因为投资者正在努力确定英国央行明年的降息幅度。【原文：Long-term UK government borrowing costs are approaching the highest level since 1998 as investors struggle to work out how much the Bank of England will cut interest rates next year.】

item.title: 北欧房东着眼于 2025 年欧元债券的复兴，因为紧缩政策正在消退
item.description: 今年秋天，随着 Heimstaden Bostad AB 和 Castellum AB 的发行，为期两年的资金紧张局面结束，2025 年欧洲企业债券市场可能会迎来更多北欧业主的发行。【原文：Europe’s corporate bond market will likely see more issuance from Nordic landlords in 2025 after a two-year funding crunch ended this fall with issues by Heimstaden Bostad AB and Castellum AB.】

item.title: 富士康对日产的兴趣在本田合并谈判中被搁置
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，在日本汽车制造商日产汽车公司与本田汽车公司就潜在合并进行谈判之际，被称为富士康的台湾 iPhone 制造商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the Taiwan-based manufacturer of iPhones known as Foxconn, is putting its interest in pursuing Nissan Motor Co. on hold while the Japanese automaker is in negotiations for a potential merger with Honda Motor Co., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士立法者提出 30 多项银行监管改革建议
item.description: 瑞士信贷去年倒闭后，瑞士正在加强金融监管，最新的推动力是议会的全面调查。【原文：Switzerland is strengthening financial regulation following the collapse last year of Credit Suisse, with the latest impulse being a comprehensive inquiry by the parliament.】

item.title: 雀巢投资者称史上最差一年后股价太便宜
item.description: 面对市场对这家瑞士消费品巨头扭亏步伐的普遍担忧，J. Stern & Co.公司一直在增持雀巢公司的股票。【原文：Nestle SA’s slumping stock valuation has made it irresistible for money manager J. Stern & Co., which has been increasing its holdings in the face of widespread market concern about the pace of a turnaround at the Swiss consumer-goods giant.】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-卡隆谈美联储的历史性调整（播客）
item.description: 周三，美联储如期降息 25 个基点。但美联储同时上调了 2025 年的通胀预期，并认为明年只需再降息两次。市场对此反应激烈，主要指标创下了长期以来最糟糕的一天。此外，市场无处可躲。除了股票，债券和黄金也遭到抛售。现在是什么情况？这对投资组合的构建意味着什么？在本期节目中，我们将采访首席投资官吉姆-卡隆（Jim Caron）。【原文：On Wednesday, the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points as expected. But it also raised its inflation outlook for 2025, and sees just two more cuts next year. The markets reacted violently to it, with the major measures posting their worst day in a long time. What’s more, there was nowhere to hide. Bonds and gold also sold off, alongside equities. So what’s going on now? And what does this mean for portfolio construction? On this episode, we speak with Jim Caron, chief investment】

item.title: 乌克兰称俄罗斯重大网络攻击袭击国家注册机构
item.description: 乌克兰内阁在 Telegram 上表示，俄罗斯黑客周四发动的大规模攻击导致乌克兰司法部管理的国家登记处暂时停止运行。【原文：A massive attack by Russian hackers on Thursday caused a temporary halt in the operation of state registries run by Ukraine’s Justice Ministry, the country’s cabinet said on Telegram.】
